name: Underground gnome
description:
You have to take on the role of a curious miner and go to dark dungeons in search of wealth and glory. On your way you will meet a lot of traps and dangerous enemies, treasures and jewels, as well as meet true friends.

Underground gnome is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Go through different levels and collect bonuses.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Lots of levels
- Nice soundtrack
